author: Simon Difford
description: Berry richness fortified with cognac and balanced with lemon juice. A dash of sugar adds richness while egg white smooths.
name: Gl'amour Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine into chilled glass
